Description:
Detects the creation of files with an executable or script extension by an Office application.

Author: Vadim Khrykov (ThreatIntel), Cyb3rEng (Rule), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: File With Uncommon Extension Created By An Office Application
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\excel.exe' or process_path like '%\msaccess.exe' or process_path like '%\mspub.exe' or process_path like '%\powerpnt.exe' or process_path like '%\visio.exe' or process_path like '%\winword.exe') and (filepath like '%.bat' or filepath like '%.cmd' or filepath like '%.com' or filepath like '%.dll' or filepath like '%.exe' or filepath like '%.hta' or filepath like '%.ocx' or filepath like '%.proj' or filepath like '%.ps1' or filepath like '%.scf' or filepath like '%.scr' or filepath like '%.sys' or filepath like '%.vbe' or filepath like '%.vbs' or filepath like '%.wsf' or filepath like '%.wsh')) and  not (filepath like '%\appdata\local\assembly\tmp\%' and filepath like '%.dll') and  not ((process_path like '%\winword.exe' and filepath like '%\appdata\local\temp\webexdelta\%' and (filepath like '%.dll' or filepath like '%.exe')) or ((filepath like '%c:\users\%' and filepath like '%\appdata\local\microsoft\office\%' and filepath like '%\webservicecache\allusers%') and filepath like '%.com')))
